title: Client keeps crashing causing me to lose LP >_<
body:
This happens after almost every game and its really frustrating restarting my client after every game and always waiting the leaverbuster after my client crashes.

I'm very disappointed

replies.body: Can you give some more details on what you mean by crash?  As an example, are you receiving any error messages?  What are you seeing?  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=P7wLoFlj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-03T23:09:48.634+0000)
>
> Can you give some more details on what you mean by crash?  As an example, are you receiving any error messages?  What are you seeing?  Let me know!

No error messages, Just happens randomly after a few games/every game. I.E. I accept a match, and then my game freezes but the audio still works etc.

Thanks for the update!  Did you recently update Windows?  The freezing may be due to a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) having issues.  Disabling that can fix this up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=P7wLoFlj,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-03T23:40:31.061+0000)
>
> Thanks for the update!  Did you recently update Windows?  The freezing may be due to a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) having issues.  Disabling that can fix this up!

Yes aha I've disabled Xbox Game Bar a long time ago before this started happening.
Can confirm it has happened a few times to me, will just freeze randomly
